reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and appreciate its beautiful shade of blue, with one noting it complements gray-white accent hair. Moreover, the dress is comfortable, well-made, and comes in the correct size. However, the fabric quality receives mixed feedback, and several customers report that the dress arrives wrinkled and frayed at the ends. Additionally, opinions about the chest opening are mixed.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the Dress ðŸŽ‰
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! I am 5'3" and 208 lbs, and the fit was fantastic. The flow of the skirt was gorgeous and I received so many compliments. Not heavy or hot. The color was perfect and really complemented my natural gray-white accent hair (embracing it ladies) and silver shoes. It's a great choice for a formal or semi-formal wedding guest. The dress has the look of a wrap dress and comes with a tie belt made from the same fabric. The only issue was that it wanted to come open a bit in the chest, and I had to pin it closed...if only I had a larger girl's to fill it out... Otherwise, it's a perfect dress! Read more
items.author: LLynn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value and looked good
items.body: Great fit but didn't work for the event I was attending. The size was correct. Read more
items.author: Jollyn Hilliard Realtor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits to size.
items.body: Dress fit to size! It was comfortable and not so heavy that you got hot easily. Great fall wedding dress. Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not fattening
items.body: This is a plus size dress but the picture shows a model that is NOT plus size and when I received it it fit like a moo-moo. It is absolutely not flattering on a a plus size lady. Itâ€™s going back Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Baggy wrap top; will need tailoring for small chest and non-full large chests
items.body: The dress is pretty but a bit thin. The lace is that thickish feeling lace. Itâ€™s an ok dress. As someone mentioned, it is not small chest friendly. I feel my chest looks very much â€œfalse advertisementâ€ but itâ€™s still a 34GG/34J. My chest is not full so the dress just looks frumpy on me. The top is still too loose and i wish it was taken in about an inch or so. For fuller large breasted women maybe? It was a back up emergency dress for me, but the dress I wanted came in time. Iâ€™ll just tailor the top part later. I do like how it hangs though. Iâ€™m pudgy, so I have a tummy. The dress sits nicely across the front and the back sits nicely as wellâ€” without special underwear. I am short, so the dress is a little long, but the length is nice. I like the high/low looks of the bottom of the dress. Again my only issue with the dress is the top. I guess this can be a fall dress if you count fall just starting. But later into fall, I donâ€™t see this keeping you warm. The arms are very thin compared to the rest of the dress. Read more
items.author: LaunchB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: At 5â€™2â€ this high-low skirt style just brushed the floor (wearing a 2â€ heel shoe) which was great. Lots of compliments. Lucked out with a cami top I had in exact shade of navy, so I didnâ€™t need to give any thought to the cross-front styling but I could see that being a challenge if you do without (might call for a safety pin). Pretty floral pattern was subtle but elegant. Long sleeves were lightweight. A light steam iron took the creases out easily. The side tie belt accent was comfortable. Read more
items.author: JS

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase
items.body: Great fit, flattering, sheer sleeve adds a bit of elegance to design. Comfortable material. Read more
items.author: lindsay arriola

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Delivered dirty
items.body: The condition of this dress is disgusting! It was a ball of fabric shoved into a tiny bag, the lace is a wrinkled mess BUT the worst part is that it is covered in White Dog Hair with some kind of tiny white flakes and strings of red thread all over it! Did Someone wear it and returned it?? Gross! Read more
items.author: linda mullin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Burgundy, Sage Green, Black, Navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
